symptoms.label: Describe Symptoms
symptoms.placeholder: e.g., 'Patient has a high fever, persistent cough, and difficulty breathing for the last 2 days.'
symptoms.description: Provide a detailed description of the patient's symptoms, including duration and severity.

analysis.title: AI-Powered Analysis
analysis.placeholder: Analysis results will be displayed here.

history.title: Consultation History
history.description: A log of past symptom analyses for this patient.

analysisSaved.title: Analysis Saved
analysisSaved.description: The consultation has been saved to the patient's record.

analysisFailed.title: Analysis Failed
analysisFailed.description: There was an error processing the symptoms. Please try again.

upload.title: Upload Image
upload.description: Upload a medical image and provide a description for analysis.

image.label: Medical Image
image.fileTypes: PNG, JPG, or other image formats

description.label: Image Description
description.placeholder: e.g., 'Skin lesion on the patient's forearm, appeared 1 week ago.'

analysis.title: AI-Powered Analysis
analysis.description: This is an AI-generated analysis and should be confirmed by a medical professional.
analysis.placeholder: Analysis results will be displayed here.

noImage.title: No Image Selected
noImage.description: Please upload an image to analyze.

analysisFailed.title: Analysis Failed
analysisFailed.description: There was an error processing the image. Please try again.

patientData.title: Patient Data
patientData.description: Fill in the patient's data to assess for emergency conditions.

symptoms.label: Symptoms
symptoms.placeholder: e.g., Chest pain, shortness of breath

medicalHistory.label: Relevant Medical History
medicalHistory.placeholder: e.g., History of heart attack, diabetes

patientLocation.label: Patient Location
patientLocation.placeholder: e.g., Village A, near the community hall

assessment.title: Emergency Assessment
assessment.placeholder: Assessment results will be shown here.

detectionFailed.title: Detection Failed
detectionFailed.description: There was an error processing the data. Please try again.

noContent.title: No Health Education Content
noContent.description: There is currently no health education material available. Please check back later.

dialog.title: Schedule New Session
dialog.description: Fill in the details to schedule a new telemedicine session.

error.title: Error
error.description: Could not create session. User not authenticated.

sessionScheduled.title: Session Scheduled
sessionScheduled.description: Your telemedicine session has been successfully scheduled.

medicalInfo.title: Medical Information
medicalInfo.description: This information will be shared with responders in an emergency.

allergies.label: Allergies
allergies.placeholder: e.g., Peanuts, Penicillin. Press Enter to add.

chronicConditions.label: Chronic Conditions
chronicConditions.placeholder: e.g., Diabetes, Hypertension. Press Enter to add.

medications.label: Current Medications
medications.placeholder: e.g., Metformin, Lisinopril. Press Enter to add.

emergencyContacts.title: Emergency Contacts
emergencyContacts.description: These contacts will be notified in an emergency.

profileUpdated.title: Profile Updated
profileUpdated.description: Your profile information has been successfully saved.

emergencyCard.title: Emergency Medical Card
emergencyCard.description: Show this to first responders in an emergency.
